name: The Mavric Flan Expirence REMASTER
description:
Show this game to your boss, your granny, the guy at the car wash with the MAGA hat, yes its true!

Everyone can enjoy the Mavric Flan Expirence. I bet you didn't expect that would be the case, but believe it or not, even your floor will enjoy this representational narrative that exceeds even the most effervescent pursuit of greatness. Through pictorial analogy we present to you.

With the eternal words of Lorne Greene "Whoopie ti yi yo, git along, little dogies"
